info.description: ccf-grlc: Useful SPARQL queries for HRA work + API via grlc.io
info.title: ccf-grlc

get.description:
```
#+ summary: get 2D FTU images and parts

PREFIX hint: <http://www.bigdata.com/queryHints#> 
PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX UBERON: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>
PREFIX LOD: <https://lod.humanatlas.io>

SELECT DISTINCT ?organ_id ?ftu_digital_object ?image_url ?organ_label ?ftu_label ?ftu_part_label ?organ_iri ?ftu_iri ?ftu_part_iri
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?ftu_illustration a ccf:FtuIllustration ;
  	a ?ftu_iri ;
  	ccf:ccf_located_in ?organ_iri ;
    ccf:illustration_node [ a ?ftu_part_iri ] ;
    ccf:image_file [
      ccf:file_format ?format ;
      ccf:file_url ?image_url
    ] .
  BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?ftu_illustration), "#primary", "")) as ?ftu_digital_object)
  
  ?ftu_part_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_part_label .
  ?ftu_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_label .
  ?organ_iri rdfs:label ?organ_label .

  BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?organ_iri), STR(UBERON:), 'UBERON:')) as ?organ_id)
  FILTER(?format = "image/png") # or "image/svg+xml"
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_iri), STR(obo:)))
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_part_iri), STR(obo:)))
}

```
get.summary: get 2D FTU images and parts

get.description:
```
#+ summary: get 2D FTU images and parts that are unique to the ftu

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX part_of: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050>
PREFIX UBERON: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_>
PREFIX CL: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/CL_>
PREFIX overlaps: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0002131>
PREFIX cl_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/cl.owl>
PREFIX pcl_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/pcl.owl>
PREFIX uberon_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/uberon.owl>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?organ_id ?ftu_digital_object ?image_url ?organ_label ?ftu_label ?ftu_part_label ?organ_iri ?ftu_iri ?ftu_part_iri
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/uberon>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/cl>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/uberon/redundant>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/cl/redundant>
FROM NAMED HRA:
WHERE {
  GRAPH HRA: {
    ?ftu_illustration a ccf:FtuIllustration ;
      a ?ftu_iri ;
      ccf:ccf_located_in ?organ_iri ;
      ccf:illustration_node [ a ?ftu_part_iri ] ;
      ccf:image_file [
        ccf:file_format ?format ;
        ccf:file_url ?image_url
      ] .
    BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?ftu_illustration), "#primary", "")) as ?ftu_digital_object)
    
    ?ftu_part_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_part_label .
    ?ftu_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_label .
    ?organ_iri rdfs:label ?organ_label .

    BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?organ_iri), STR(UBERON:), 'UBERON:')) as ?organ_id)
    FILTER(?format = "image/png") # or "image/svg+xml"
    FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_iri), STR(obo:)))
    FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_part_iri), STR(obo:)))
  }

  ?parent_as part_of: ?organ_iri .
  ?ftu_iri part_of:* ?parent_as .
  ?ftu_part_iri overlaps:|part_of:+ ?ftu_iri .

  OPTIONAL {
    ?other_as part_of: ?organ_iri .
    ?ftu_part_iri overlaps:|part_of:+ ?other_as .
    FILTER(?other_as != ?organ_iri && ?other_as != ?ftu_iri && ?other_as != ?parent_as)
  }
  FILTER(!BOUND(?other_as))
}
ORDER BY ?ftu_digital_object

```
get.summary: get 2D FTU images and parts that are unique to the ftu
Every digital object pushed to lod.humanatlas.io

get.description:
Count of 3D Anatomical Structures

```
#+ summary: Count of 3D Anatomical Structures
#+ description: Count of 3D Anatomical Structures

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT (COUNT(?as3d) as ?as_count)
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  SELECT DISTINCT ?as3d WHERE {
    ?as3d ccf:has_reference_organ ?y .
    FILTER(!CONTAINS(STR(?y), '/united-'))
  }
}

```
get.summary: Count of 3D Anatomical Structures
Count of 3D Anatomical Structures

get.description:
```
#+ summary: Unique AS, CT, and B in HRA

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT ?asctb_type (COUNT(DISTINCT(?iri)) as ?count)
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?iri ccf:ccf_asctb_type ?asctb_type
}
GROUP BY ?asctb_type
ORDER BY ?asctb_type

```
get.summary: Unique AS, CT, and B in HRA

get.description:
```
#+ summary: Unique AS, CT, and B across all HRA versions

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT ?asctb_type (COUNT(DISTINCT(?iri)) as ?count)
WHERE {
  ?iri ccf:ccf_asctb_type ?asctb_type
}
GROUP BY ?asctb_type
ORDER BY ?asctb_type
```

get.description:
Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of AS, CT, and Biomarker trios for structures part of it

```
#+ summary: AS, CT, and Biomarker trios by AS located in a given anatomical structure
#+ description: Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of AS, CT, and Biomarker trios for structures part of it

#+ defaults:
#+   - location: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX part_of: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra-api>

SELECT DISTINCT ?as_label ?ct_label ?biomarker_label ?as ?ct ?biomarker
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  # VALUES (?_location_iri) {
  #   (<http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113>)
  # }

  # Get AS of interest
  ?as ccf:ccf_part_of*|part_of:* ?_location_iri .
  ?as rdfs:label ?as_label .

  # Lookup CT + B for the AS via ASCT+B tables
  # [] a ccf:AsctbRecord ;
  #   ccf:anatomical_structure [
  #     ccf:source_concept ?as 
  #   ];
  #   ccf:cell_type [
  #     ccf:source_concept ?ct 
  #   ];
  #   ccf:biomarker_marker [
  #     ccf:source_concept ?biomarker 
  #   ] .

  # Alternative that only looks up CT+B specifically assigned to that AS, does not include children
  [] a ccf:CellMarkerDescriptor ;
    ccf:primary_anatomical_structure ?as ;
    ccf:primary_cell_type ?ct ;
    ccf:biomarker ?biomarker .

  ?ct rdfs:label ?ct_label .
  ?biomarker rdfs:label ?biomarker_label .
}

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_location_iri in the original query
parameters.name: location

get.summary: AS, CT, and Biomarker trios by AS located in a given anatomical structure

get.description:
Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of AS, CT, and Gene trios for structures part of it

```
#+ summary: AS, CT, and Gene trios by AS located in a given anatomical structure
#+ description: Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of AS, CT, and Gene trios for structures part of it

#+ defaults:
#+   - location: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX part_of: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra-api>

SELECT DISTINCT ?as_label ?ct_label ?gene_symbol ?as ?ct ?gene
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  # Get AS of interest
  ?as ccf:ccf_part_of*|part_of:* ?_location_iri .
  ?as rdfs:label ?as_label .

  # Lookup CT + B for the AS via ASCT+B tables
  [] a ccf:AsctbRecord ;
    ccf:anatomical_structure [
      ccf:source_concept ?as 
    ];
    ccf:cell_type [
      ccf:source_concept ?ct 
    ];
    ccf:gene_marker [
      ccf:source_concept ?gene 
    ] .

  # Alternative that only looks up CT+B specifically assigned to that AS, does not include children
  # [] a ccf:CellMarkerDescriptor ;
  #   ccf:primary_anatomical_structure ?as ;
  #   ccf:primary_cell_type ?ct ;
  #   ccf:biomarker ?gene .

  ?ct rdfs:label ?ct_label .
  ?gene rdfs:label ?gene_symbol .
}

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_location_iri in the original query
parameters.name: location

get.summary: AS, CT, and Gene trios by AS located in a given anatomical structure

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_location_iri in the original query
parameters.name: location

get.summary: AS, CT, and Protein trios by AS located in a given anatomical structure

get.description:
All anatomical structures part of a given anatomical structure, including itself

```
#+ summary: All AS part of a given AS
#+ description: All anatomical structures part of a given anatomical structure, including itself

#+ defaults:
#+   - location: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX part_of: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050>
PREFIX UBERON: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/uberon>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?part_iri ?part_label
FROM UBERON:
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?part_iri ccf:ccf_part_of*|part_of:* ?_location_iri .
  ?part_iri rdfs:label ?part_label .
}
ORDER BY ?part_iri

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_location_iri in the original query
parameters.name: location

get.summary: All AS part of a given AS

get.description:
Number of Anatomical Structures per Reference Organ

```
#+ summary: AS per Ref. Organ
#+ description: Number of Anatomical Structures per Reference Organ

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX UBERON: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_>
PREFIX FMA: <http://purl.org/sig/ont/fma/fma>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT
  ?organ
  ?sex
  (COUNT(?structure) AS ?as_count)
  (SAMPLE(?uberon_id) as ?uberon_id)
  (REPLACE(STR(?refOrgan), '#primary', '') as ?url)
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?structure ccf:has_reference_organ ?refOrgan .
  ?refOrgan ccf:representation_of ?organIri ;
    ccf:organ_owner_sex ?sex .
  
  ?organIri ccf:ccf_pref_label ?organ_label .

  BIND(LCASE(?organ_label) as ?organ)
  BIND(REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?organIri), STR(UBERON:), 'UBERON:'), STR(FMA:), 'FMA:') as ?uberon_id)
}
GROUP BY ?refOrgan ?organ ?sex
ORDER BY ?organ ?sex

```
get.summary: AS per Ref. Organ

get.description:
```
#+ summary: AS, CT, and BM in a given ASCT+B Table

#+ defaults:
#+   - asctb: https://purl.humanatlas.io/asct-b/lymph-node

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX has_characterizing_biomarker_set: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0015004>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?as_label ?ct_label ?bm_label ?as ?ct ?bm ?bmType
WHERE {
  GRAPH ?_asctb_iri {
    ?ct ccf:ccf_located_in ?as . # Get cell types located in an anatomical structure

    # Find all sets of biomarkers that characterize a cell type
    ?ct rdfs:subClassOf [
      owl:onProperty has_characterizing_biomarker_set: ;
      owl:someValuesFrom [ owl:intersectionOf ?bmSetId ]] .
    ?bmSetId rdf:rest*/rdf:first [
      owl:onProperty ccf:has_marker_component ;
      owl:someValuesFrom ?bm
    ] .

    # Get biomarker type
    ?bm ccf:ccf_biomarker_type ?bmType .

    ?as ccf:ccf_pref_label ?as_label .
    ?ct ccf:ccf_pref_label ?ct_label .
    ?bm ccf:ccf_pref_label ?bm_label .
  }
}
ORDER BY ?as_label

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_asctb_iri in the original query
parameters.name: asctb

get.summary: AS, CT, and BM in a given ASCT+B Table

get.description:
```
#+ summary: Biomarkers located in AS

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX has_characterizing_biomarker_set: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0015004>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?as ?bm
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?ct ccf:ccf_located_in ?as .

  ?ct rdfs:subClassOf [
  	owl:onProperty has_characterizing_biomarker_set: ;
  	owl:someValuesFrom [ owl:intersectionOf ?bn3 ]] .
  ?bn3 rdf:rest*/rdf:first [
  	owl:onProperty ccf:has_marker_component ;
    owl:someValuesFrom ?bm
  ] .
}

```
get.summary: Biomarkers located in AS

get.description:
```
#+ summary: All unique bibliography entries in DOs

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX LOD: <https://lod.humanatlas.io>

SELECT DISTINCT ?ref
FROM LOD:
WHERE {
  [] a dcat:Dataset ; dct:description ?description .
  BIND(REPLACE(STRAFTER(?description, 'Bibliography:**'), "^\\s+|\\s+$", "") as ?ref)
  FILTER(?ref != "")
}
ORDER BY ?ref

```
get.summary: All unique bibliography entries in DOs
Every digital object and their citations

get.description:
```
#+ summary: Digital objects counts in the latest HRA release

PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT ?type (COUNT(DISTINCT(?digitalObject)) as ?count)
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  HRA: prov:hadMember ?digitalObject .
  BIND(STRBEFORE(REPLACE(STR(?digitalObject), 'https://purl.humanatlas.io/', ''), '/') as ?type)
}
GROUP BY ?type
ORDER BY ?type

```
get.summary: Digital objects counts in the latest HRA release

get.description:
```
#+ summary: All unique references in DOs

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX LOD: <https://lod.humanatlas.io>

SELECT DISTINCT ?ref
FROM LOD:
WHERE {
  [] a dcat:Dataset ; dct:references ?ref .
}
ORDER BY ?ref

```
get.summary: All unique references in DOs

get.description:
```
#+ summary: ensembl ids in HRA

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbxref: <http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#hasDbXref>
PREFIX oboInOwl: <http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?gene_symbol ?hgnc_id ?ensembl_id
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?gene dbxref: ?ensembl_id ;
        oboInOwl:id ?hgnc_id ;
        rdfs:label ?gene_symbol .
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(?ensembl_id, 'ENSG'))
}
ORDER BY ?gene_symbol

```
get.summary: ensembl ids in HRA

get.description:
```
#+ summary: A lookup table from Ensembl ID to gene name and HGNC ID

PREFIX hgnc: <http://purl.bioontology.org/ontology/HGNC/>
PREFIX hgncId: <http://identifiers.org/hgnc/>
PREFIX oboInOwl: <http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#>
PREFIX HGNC: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/hgnc>

SELECT DISTINCT ?ensemble ?gene_name ?hgnc
FROM HGNC:
WHERE
{
  ?hgnc_id oboInOwl:hasDbXref ?ensemble ;
          hgnc:symbol ?gene_name .
  BIND(REPLACE(STR(?hgnc_id), STR(hgncId:), 'HGNC:') as ?hgnc)
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(?ensemble, 'ENS'))
}
ORDER BY ?ensemble

```
get.summary: A lookup table from Ensembl ID to gene name and HGNC ID
get FTU images and parts

get.description:
```
#+ summary: HRA-HPO shared Uberon and CL terms

PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX UBERON: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_>
PREFIX CL: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/CL_>
PREFIX HPO: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/hp>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?term ?term_label
WHERE {
  GRAPH HRA: {
    ?term rdfs:label ?term_label .
  }
  GRAPH HPO: {
    ?term rdfs:label ?term_label .
  }
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?term), STR(UBERON:)) || STRSTARTS(STR(?term), STR(CL:)))
}
ORDER BY ?term

```
get.summary: HRA-HPO shared Uberon and CL terms

get.description:
Number of ASCTB-TEMP IDs in ASCT+B tables

```
#+ summary: ASCT+B TEMP IDs in HRA
#+ description: Number of ASCTB-TEMP IDs in ASCT+B tables

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>
PREFIX ASCTB-TEMP: <https://purl.org/ccf/ASCTB-TEMP_>

SELECT ?asctb_type (COUNT(DISTINCT(?iri)) as ?count)
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?iri ccf:ccf_asctb_type ?asctb_type1 .
  OPTIONAL {
  	?iri ccf:ccf_biomarker_type ?bm_type . 
  }
  BIND(IF(BOUND(?bm_type), CONCAT("BM (", ?bm_type, ")"), STR(?asctb_type1)) AS ?asctb_type)
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?iri), STR(ASCTB-TEMP:)))
}
GROUP BY ?asctb_type
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
```
get.summary: ASCT+B TEMP IDs in HRA
All digital objects published to the HRA KG
ref-organ-dois in HRA v2.2

get.description:
Reference Organ GLB information

```
#+ summary: Reference Organ GLB information
#+ description: Reference Organ GLB information

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT (STR(?refOrgan) as ?ref_organ) ?glb_url ?scene_node
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?refOrgan ccf:has_reference_organ ?refOrgan .
  ?refOrgan ccf:has_object_reference [
  	ccf:file_url ?glb_url ;
    ccf:file_subpath ?scene_node  
  ] .
}
ORDER BY ?ref_organ

```
get.summary: Reference Organ GLB information

get.description:
Reference Organ GLB information

```
#+ summary: Reference Organ GLB information
#+ description: Reference Organ GLB information

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?ref_organ_digital_object ?glb_url ?scene_node ?as_label ?as_iri  
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?refOrganPart ccf:has_reference_organ ?refOrgan ;
      ccf:representation_of ?as_iri .
  ?refOrganPart ccf:has_object_reference [
    ccf:file_url ?glb_url ;
    ccf:file_subpath ?scene_node  
  ] .
  ?as_iri rdfs:label ?as_label .
  BIND(IRI(STRBEFORE(REPLACE(STR(?refOrgan), "#primary", ""), '/v1.')) as ?ref_organ_digital_object)
  FILTER(!CONTAINS(STR(?refOrgan), '/ref-organ/united'))
}
ORDER BY ?ref_organ_digital_object ?as_label

```
get.summary: Reference Organ GLB information

get.description:
```
#+ summary: A list of unmapped AS, CT, and B terms in HRA

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX ASCTB-TEMP: <https://purl.org/ccf/ASCTB-TEMP_>

SELECT DISTINCT ?table ?asctb_type ?iri
WHERE {
  GRAPH ?table {
    ?iri ccf:ccf_asctb_type ?asctb_type .
    FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?iri), STR(ASCTB-TEMP:)))
  }
  FILTER (STRSTARTS(STR(?table), 'https://purl.humanatlas.io/asct-b'))
}
ORDER BY ?table ?asctb_type ?iri

```
get.summary: A list of unmapped AS, CT, and B terms in HRA

get.description:
```
#+ summary: Unmapped AS, CT, and B in HRA
#+ endpoint: https://lod.humanatlas.io/sparql

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>
PREFIX ASCTB-TEMP: <https://purl.org/ccf/ASCTB-TEMP_>

SELECT ?asctb_type (COUNT(DISTINCT(?iri)) as ?count)
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?iri ccf:ccf_asctb_type ?asctb_type
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?iri), STR(ASCTB-TEMP:)))
}
GROUP BY ?asctb_type
ORDER BY ?asctb_type

```
get.summary: Unmapped AS, CT, and B in HRA

prov:
